guildhest
Cultist rosary
Cultist orbs destroyed
Sealed barrier broken
You seem surprised. Did you not cross our gates in search of blood?
Come hither, children of the dawn. The undying master will drink deep tonight!

Activate the Fool's Rest terminal
The guildhest is complete! Come and collect your reward.
Eliminate all targets.
Slay <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>.
Capture <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>.
Escort <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 02E8020202 /var> to the specified location.
A fine display! Now come, collect your reward.
Done, are we? Then haul your bloody arses over here so's we can leave this awful place!
That was...adequate. Back to me, adventurer.
You've a knack for this, haven't you? 'Twas as if I were watching myself, ten summers past!
Defeat one enemy group at a time.
If <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var> spots you, he will order all remaining targets to attack. Stay out of his line of sight and tackle his minions one at a time.
If <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var> spots you, he will order all remaining targets to attack. Stay out of his line of sight and tackle his minions one at a time.
Steady there! Only a fool with a death wish would engage both parties at once!
Don't be so bloody eager to march headlong into peril! Try luring the beasts away from the goobbue without alarming the mossy lout.
Executed to perfection! Now put the seedkin down!
The goobbue has seen you and alerted his scrags! Slay as many as you can before jumpin' in bed with the giant, or you won't survive another bell!
Get up! You won't do your allies any good lying sprawled across the grass like a beached whale!
What in the seven hells are you fools doing!? Fall back and regroup!
Might be I was mistaken about you all. I'd say your chances of victory are a notch above dismal.
You've come this far, now finish him!
When threatened, <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var> will summon reinforcements. Stay alert!
Beware of <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>'s new weaponskill.
Beware of <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>'s new weaponskill.
The stronger of your allies would be wise to draw the enemy's attention away from the weaker.
Those allies specialized in dealing damage will find their attacks more effective when dealt from the enemy's flank or rear.
Reinforcements! Move to intercept!
Another wave! But unlike the last!
Defeat <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020302 /var> to open the first gate.
Defeat the enemies and use the lever to open the gate.
Defeat <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var> before the yarzons break free.
Behind you! Slay the lesser enemies before concentrating your efforts on the true threat.
Pull the lever and open the gate!
Quickly! Those boulders will not hold the yarzons back for long!
There to the left of the gate! A second swarm of yarzons has appeared! Hurry and fell the gigantoad or you will have the vilekin to deal with, as well.
A swarm of yarzons has broken through! Your attention is best focused on clearing away the six-legged vilekin before returning to the gigantoad.
A second swarm approaches quickly! Ready yourselves!
A superb display of strength and speed! Well done!
The boulders are beginning to crack!
The boulders will crumble at any moment, allowing the yarzons entry!
Now pull the lever to open the gate...but only when you are ready for what waits on the other side.
My orders are to aid you to victory. You only make it harder on yourselves by disregarding them.
Now that those two are out of the way, concentrate your efforts on the hog.
Something tells me there will be more if you cannot make swift work of that toad.
The first gate is open! Tend to your wounds before advancing to the second.
The second gate is open! One more, and you will have breached the gigantoad's lair.
The third gate has fallen! The lord of the lair awaits beyond!
The safety mechanism on the gate will deactivate once all threats in the area have been removed.
<var 2B ((<var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020302 /var>)) /var> will attempt to heal <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8030202 /var>.
Use fire sprite cores to light the herb patch and release slumber-inducing smoke into the air.
Your orders are to capture the gil turtle. The best manner in which to accomplish this task is by first weakening the poor creature.

The craven bandits who spirited away the turtle would not have you reclaim their prize, and will heal the creature's wounds with hopes that their efforts will discourage you into leaving. Draw the turtle away from the conjurers.
In its current weakened state, the gil turtle will be unable to resist the effects of the herbs. Now quickly! We require fire sprite cores!
Use the core to light the herb patch lying before me.
The herbs are aflame! Now do what you must to draw the gil turtle into the smoke!
And so the gentle giant succumbs to slumber's blissful embrace. Our work here is complete.
Those efts may prove troublesome if left alone. Slay the wavekin before the situation becomes problematic.
Out of cores? Well then claim new ones! You'd think that much was obvious!
Stay your blades! The client specifically stated that he wished his pet returned alive!
You blundering half-wits! Now what are we to tell Lord Adeledji!
The smoke will have little effect on the turtle while in his current condition.
Releasing the smoke now would be useless. I shall tend to the herbs while you see to the gil turtle.
Fire sprite cores
Silence those bandits!
Lure enemies away from the ruptured pollen clusters before engaging them.
Stay clear of the ruptured pollen clusters when engaging enemies.
If inhaled the pollen will set fire to your lungs and sap your strength. Draw the creatures a safe distance from the noisome mist and then engage.
Do not let down your guard. The battle has only just begun.
It may take some coercing to draw that one from the mist.
Leave the mist at once! You will need all your strength to defeat these horrors of the wood!
Maneuver clear of the raining pollen clusters lest you find yourself caught in their mist!
The wind! It carries away the mist! The Matron smiles upon us!
The mist, it returns!
The creature has left the pollen mist! Now is your chance! Strike it down!
Your foe weakens with every blow you land! Do not let up!
Yes! I do believe you have him! It won't be much longer now!
Defeat the roaming bandits before engaging the stationary targets.
Beware of reinforcements.
Prevent the conjurers from healing their wounded companions.
Redbellies! To me!
My wounds! Someone see to my wounds!
Where are all my men!?
Ware the scouts, for they will alert their brethren of your presence.
The swarmpoint has summoned reinforcements! Locate them immediately!
Their conjurers will spell your end. Silence the casters so that there are none who might heal the swarmpoint.
Keep your eyes open for roaming bandits who will join the fray! Remember this when situating your battles.
Without their conjurers to heal them, you should make quick work of the others.
The swarmpoint is known for his unmatchable strength. Send your hardiest allies to bear the brunt of his might while the others slowly drain his vitality.
Reinforcements! See to the conjurers before your efforts are rendered to naught.
Another unit! You know what you must do!
Not all their spellweavers are masters of the curative arts. Learn to distinguish the healers from the rest!
Lo! There is a conjurer in your midst! Find the cur and slay him!
Use the guild-issue items to your advantage.
Take care not to succumb to the enfeebling effects of the charmed creatures' attacks.
Beware the enfeebling properties of Briaxio's attacks.
Reinforcements called
Beware! The foul poisons of these creatures will disrupt your humours and send your body into fits.
Do not let the poisons overwhelm you! Use the time between battles to purge the toxins from your veins.
Confirm that each of your allies knows his role. One misstep could mean a man poisoned, paralyzed...or worse!
Use the spell Esuna to your advantage! And if that fails you, a good old antidote will often do the trick.
Without an ally to draw his magicks away from the others, Briaxio will unleash his bane on all of you!
Briaxio's followers have rushed to his aid! Send several of your allies to drive off the reinforcements while those remaining keep Briaxio under control.
Destroy the goblins' makeshift barricades and continue up the Matron's Lethe.
Avoid Stikflix Grumblytoss's bombs.
The goblins hide behind their barricades. You must destroy these obstacles to reach them. However, be always aware of their bombs.
The bombs wielded by Stikflix Grumblytoss are much deadlier and have a greater blast radius than those used by his ragtag army.
Remember your roles within the party and communicate with your allies. Those are the keys to victory!
If a bomb is tossed your way, do not panic. Simply retreat until it detonates and then return to the front lines.
I shall give the goblins credit where credit is due. It must have taken them a half-turn of the sun to drag these crates into place... Now demolish them!
The first station is toppled, but another lies near the top of the heavenspillar. Forward, adventurers!
The goblins' leader, Stikflix Grumblytoss, awaits ahead! Give him no quarter!

Stikflix Grumblytoss may not appear to be the most formidable of foes, but his realm-shaking explosives make him a force to be reckoned with. If one happens to land in your vicinity, you would take my advice and run.
Rotten jam will emerge from the stale bubbles if ignored. Burst them before they burst on their own.
When burst, acid bubbles will emit a harmful, corrosive liquid. Avoid attacking them at all costs.
Rotten jam! That's why I warned you to burst the stale bubbles. Now you have that <var 1A 02 /var>thing<var 1A 01 /var> to deal with!
That wasn't so hard now, was it?
What did the damn morbol do, pass wind!? See to the bubbles afore they see to you!
I reckon you've done this before. That was some proper combat, if I do say so meself.
What are you fixing to do? Get us all killed?
Not another! Just the smell alone is enough to make a man retch! Do away with the thing, would you?
The stale bubbles, not the acid bubbles, you mud-brained dullard!
Send the damned thing back to the hell it slithered up from!
Good eyes, adventurers! Good eyes!
Not the most pleasant buggers to fight, are they? Maybe next time you'll heed me words and burst the bubbles first.
See the bastard's vines start to twitch? The creature grows weak!
Leave them stale bubbles be, and from them'll drop a dollop of rancid ooze almost as foul as me ma's gruel. If you don't want to see that happen, burst the bubbles quick.
Buso draws his strength from the blue flames. Extinguish the flames to make him more susceptible to your attacks.
A new blue flame will appear where <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 02E8020202 /var> is slain. Choose your battles.
If you are branded with Buso's Mark of Pain, distance yourself from your allies so that they are not caught in the Dark Dome.
Those horrible blue flames─they're the aetherial traces of slain voidsent. Our Lifestream won't have the stuff, so the essence remains trapped in the corporeal realm. Buso taps that essence...
You cannot slay a void hound without it leaving behind a flame. If you are to cull the beasts, be ready to deal swiftly with the consequences of your actions.
Buso readies the Mark of Pain! Once marked, you cannot escape the fate you are dealt...but you can spare your allies!
Go! Smother the blue flames! It's the only way to see Buso weakened!
Damn! Another blue flame is lit! Buso grows stronger every moment he basks in its unholy light!
Rise up, adventurer! This battle is not yet lost! Remember the blue flames!
Only one flame remains! Quickly! See it out!
Now is your chance! Tear the fiend limb from limb...from limb from limb!
Buso seeks to mark those allies who douse his flames!
One of you has been marked! For Twelve's sake and the sake of the others, run!
Thrust him back into the void!
Draw Buso away from the blue flames before extinguishing them!

Pshhh! Finleshhh fools!
The Lord of the Whorl shhhall sssup upon your sssouls!
My flames shall consume thy flesh and soul both!
Succumb to the Inferno!
Surrender thyself to the fires of judgment!
Thy soul shall burn for eternity!
Thou art strong, mortal!
The blessing of Light...defies me!?
Six-onze pinches of firesand

MASTERS MUST PAY! MASTERS MUST DIE!
NEVER AGAIN! NEVER!

Engage the shadowclaw.
Avoid the invincible <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 04E8020202 /var> and focus your attacks on the shadowclaw.
Avoid the invincible <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 04E8020202 /var> and focus your attacks on the shadowclaw.
Avoid the invincible <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 04E8020202 /var> and focus your attacks on the shadowclaw.
<var 2B ((<var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>)) /var> is all you need be concerned with. Shut all else out.
<var 2B ((<var 31 ((BNpcName)) 02E8020202 /var>)) /var>... Ware his attacks, but do not let the fiend lure you from your objective.

<var 2B ((<var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020302 /var>)) /var> wander 'twixt this realm and theirs, appearing only for a few moments. Pay them no heed, and they will pay you none in turn. Draw too close, and...
Do not be lured in by <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>'s dance. Keep your distance and keep your head.
Can you not see your blows to <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var> have no effect? Avoid its attacks and concentrate your efforts on the shadowclaw.
<var 2B ((<var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>)) /var>'s magicks can smother the field of battle. Stay light on your feet.
Watch carefully. Order can be discovered in the shadows' movements, if you would but seek it.
You are doing well. The beast weakens.
There is little life left in this one, but do not let down your guard. The battle is far from over.
Never before have I seen such mastery of the battlefield. You have far exceeded my expectations, adventurers.
<var 2B ((<var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>)) /var> will appear once her subjects are slain.
Watch for <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>'s order to self-destruct.
The servitors will self-destruct once approached. Either strike them from afar, or avoid them altogether.
All rise for Her Royal Highness! When angered, the queen will order her remaining subjects to self-destruct. Do not get caught in the blast.
The servitors will not hesitate to self-destruct. Steel your defenses!
Bomb chars are just as quick to burst as the servitors. Fall back!
There! To the rear! The bomb chars advance!
There is no end to the bomb chars. Turn your eyes elsewhere.
He who slumbers is doomed to bear the blast's full force. Silence the slimes, lest you succumb to the flames.
The queen's subjects number in the thousands. You cannot dispel them all!
The order has been given! Scatter!
That was but one baronet amongst many. He may have fallen, but another will soon rise to replace him.
Good! The life spills from <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var> with every blow!
When the queen falls, her subjects will be overtaken with grief and end their lives. Take care not to join them!
Do not grow overconfident. While one candle gutters, still a hundred bonfires rage.
How little the queen's baronets value their own lives. In a sense, they are the perfect subjects.
The queen will not step down from her throne so easily.
Sound the bells! The queen is dead!
All five <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 04E8020302 /var> must be defeated simultaneously.

Listen carefully if you want to live. <var 2B ((<var 31 ((BNpcName)) 02E8020202 /var>)) /var> will not stay dead for long. Allow his dark brothers but a moment, and they'll drag the fallen back from the gates of the seventh hell.
Another formation change!
Make ready! The camios seek to regroup!
They're forming a defensive line!
A circle! The Screaming Circle!
The Wall of Naught! The camios seek a new victim!
The Black Cross renders a single camio invincible. Ignore him and focus your attacks on the rest!
The Demon's Sword! The burden on your front line will be great. Healers, do not fail your allies!
Something rises from the Pit! Do not falter!
Their foul magicks protect him! Your attacks amount to naught!
As long as one cannot be harmed, you will never be able to destroy the lot!
One is down. Quickly! Finish the others!
You see? Slaying one is of no use! You must defeat all five at once if the day is to be yours!
The camio draws strength from the Demon's Sword. He will tear your front line apart!
Follow the camio's eyes! Draw them away from your spell casters!
Do not waste your efforts on the one who cannot be harmed!
Shields up, front line!
Rid the playing field of our new guest!
Back to the task at hand, lads!
Show them only as much mercy as they would show you! None!
You've done it! They can no longer escape their dark demesne!
Protect the Allagan artifacts from the quarreling gigants.
Defeat the leaders to prevent the summoning of reinforcements.
Hurry to the foot of the hill! The artifacts will not protect themselves!
They're fighting amongst themselves! Let them bloody each other's noses before coming in to wipe up the mess!
Small units approach! Keep them off the artifacts!
Gigants from multiple sides! You'll need to divide your strength if the artifacts are to be saved!
The gigas leader, Crius! He will summon his minions if not put to the sword!
Giants to the east! Stop them before they can make the approach!
Hecatoncheires to the south! Slaying them might just anger their leader onto the battlefield!
Thal's balls! Both giant <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> hecatoncheir leaders make for the artifacts!
Damnation! Keep the leaders away from one another! It will only serve to worsen matters!
The gigants swing their weapons with reckless abandon! Draw them from the artifacts so as to prevent any collateral damage!
The gigas leader flees! Now is your chance! Run the bastard through!
The giant leader falls back... Something is amiss!
That is not the back of a fleeing man! The hecatoncheir leads you into a trap!
More gigants take the field, and will continue to do so until you have seen their leaders slain!
Not a single scratch on any of the artifacts. I wouldn't believe it if I hadn't seen it with mine own eyes!
All the artifacts remain! The Sons of Saint Coinach will be pleased!
Two artifacts remain standing. See that they are not destroyed!
A single artifact remains! You cannot allow it to be lost!
The leaders have yet to take the field, but could arrive at any moment. Stay alert!
Without an enemy to strike, the gigants have turned their fury on the artifacts!
<var 2B ((<var 31 ((BNpcName)) 04E8020202 /var>)) /var>

<var 2B ((<var 28 ((EventItem)) E80201 /var>)) /var>.
Cancel.
It sits motionless.
A statuette has already been placed.
I will suffer none to oppose Lord van Baelsar!
My shields are impregnable! Join the countless challengers who have dashed themselves against them!
Your defeat will bring Lord van Baelsar's noble conquest one step closer to fruition!
Ungh... Though it cost me my life...I <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> strike you down!
Heehee HAHA hahaha HEEHEE haha HEEEEEE!!!
Soon you will see the depths of your folly, mortals!
THE RECKONING COMES!!!
There is no escape! No hope! NONE!!!
Die! DIE!!! DIIIIIIEEE!!!
My power... No...
Sons of man! Murderers of my children!
For thee my hatred is unending, unyielding!
Tremble before the might of the earth!
To the last, I grapple with thee!
I shall grind thee beneath my heel, mortal!
Hie, my children, into the dark! <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> will not be denied...
I'm here... I'm here... I'm here...
Mother... Father... I can't... I can't find you...
WAAAKE UUUUUUP!!!
Why... Why... Why... WHYYYYYY!!!
I said I'd come! I said I'd come! I'm here... I'm here... I'm here...
Where are you... Where are you...

Darken the searchlight
Darken the searchlight
Stand back! I'm going to blast open the bulkhead!
This might take a while! Watch my back!
I'm almost there! Keep that thing occupied!
Come, <var 1A 02 /var>hero<var 1A 01 /var>, show me what you can do. Show me...<var 1A 02 /var>everything<var 1A 01 /var>!
I see...
You will <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> take any more from me!
The pain I have suffered, I shall visit upon you a hundredfold!
You lot! Make yourselves useful!
You have made me <var 1A 02 /var>wroth<var 1A 01 /var>!
Noooooo! I will not lose...to the likes of <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>!
Damn it, that colossus is enhanced! Hold on─I'll try to think of something!

You'll need proper firepower to blast through that. Try and find another path to the armor bay.
There ought to be an identification key reader nearby. You need to complete pilot registration before you can activate an armor.
Well, well, would you look at this! I've found just the unit for you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
I'll send the identification data to the terminal. You can use that to activate her.
I have taken the liberty of preparing an <var 1A 02 /var>electrifying<var 1A 01 /var> stage for you.
Meet one of my creations. You might find it a <var 1A 02 /var>handful<var 1A 01 /var>.
I will lay Garlond low, but first I must break you!
<pant> I will not suffer...to be in another's shadow!
Let us dance, champion of Eorzea.
Impressive! Now it is <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> turn!
Yaaaaaarrrgh!
The Ultima Weapon has partaken of the power of eikons! None can stand against it!
Hearken unto me, crystal bearer. Thy foe is Darkness clad in steel.
If thou wouldst triumph, thou must look to the Light.
Yield to the storm!
Garuda's essence...torn from the Ultima Weapon!?
Kneel to the might below!
Titan's as well!? Impossible!
Succumb to the flames!
Nooo! How...how are you doing this!?
We settle this once and for all!
I need not the power of eikons to defeat you!
This is most...unexpected. You are possessed of great might, this I will allow.
Yet yours is not the might of a ruler! Such is the difference between us─a difference that will assure my victory!
U-Ultima!? Curse you, Ascian!
How much destruction must be wreaked before you are sated!?
I have not the strength...to shield thee again...
Permit not the manifestation of that vile magick...lest Darkness prevail!
Your time is at an end, Hydaelyn!
From the deepest pit of the seven hells to the very pinnacle of the heavens, the world shall tremble! Unleash Ultima!
Ahahahaha! You are strong, Warrior of Light!
Yet know that if I should perish, so too will the mortal within whose flesh I reside.
Now make your choice and live with it! Muahahahahaha!
Mark not the Dark Minion's subtle words.
Only Light may banish the Darkness.
Receive of me this power, my child, and raise thy Crystal aloft!
Ultima detonation in 20 seconds.
Ultima detonation in 10 seconds.
Ultima detonation in 5...

Biggy's muscles bulge! Ow-ow-ow...
Biggy has only begun to fight!
Biggy is small, but Biggy's heart is big!
Aieeeeee! Biggy's too young to die!

MY SONS... I...FAIL...YOU...
CUTE WRIGGLY-WIGGLIES! CRUSH PUNY ONES!
Hearken unto me, brave Mogglesguard! These villains shall threaten you no more!
Lend me your strength, and I shall purge our enemies from Thornmarch!
You shall suffer for your transgressions against my subjects!
Hold fast, Mogglesguard! Together we shall cast them out!
Mogglesguard, to arms! Your king has need of you!
Receive of my body, Mogglesguard! Let my strength become yours!
Begone, pomless ones! Torment my subjects no more!

I shall feast upon your very soul!

This way lies the first stage! By way of a warm-up, your opponents will be beasts and mammets!
The second stage begins! Gird your loins for a <var 1A 02 /var>beastly<var 1A 01 /var> encounter!
You have done well to come this far, but the hardest trials are yet to come. In the third stage, you must clash steel with seasoned gladiators!

And so we arrive at the climactic ending! Victory belongs to the beauteous!
You may be able to stand with the best of the bloodsands, but how will you fare against the mightiest thaumaturge of the age?
There is no escaping the Absolute Bind!
Wh-What? But...how!?
Run, my pretties, lest you feel the searing kiss of my magicks!
You trespass upon my domain, tainted of the Light!
Drink deep of the sea's bitter draught!
Mine is the power to cleanse all things! Naught can withstand the relentless onslaught of my waves!
You challenge me with trickery? Fools! Your mortal contrivances cannot quell the raging sea!
My waters...are stilled... This...this is the blessing of Light?

What manner of prey...bites back? I must warn...Lord Forgall...
Ah, some of you survived. How convenient. I am in need of fresh souls to shatter the ward.
<cough> After so long...I am arisen... I will not...be buried here...
Even empty husks have their uses. See how they jerk and dance at my command!
I will teach those who oppose me the extent of their folly...
Your pitiful lives will be mine in due time. But first, you must be punished for your insolence!
Solitude weakens the spirit and warps the flesh... Stray from the pack at your peril!
Will you glimpse the realm that awaits you after death? Drink deep from the chalice of oblivion!
Ah, how sweet the rancid breeze of the underhells... Its winds will strip you to the bone!
Arise, my rotting playthings! The board needs more pieces in play!
My undead toys are so easily broken. Mayhap my minions will prove the sturdier...
How tiresome. I had thought to spare my energies for the ward. But you insist on gripping to life so very tightly...
Embrace your fate! By my stygian light be your doom revealed!
My lord warned that mortals of power might interfere... But you are no threat to me! I reign in the court of the void!
Know your slayer, intruders. I am Calofisteri, and by the blood of voidsent have I ascended to the sublime...
Behold my magnificent mane! These curls are blades that cut, and roots that drain!
Shall I share my luscious locks with you?
Unkempt thieves! Slovenly marauders! You will not have the Nullstone!
Have you ever witnessed such coifed perfection!? The edges of my tresses are sharper than swords!
...Why do you yet stand? I have supped on the void! What ungodly power swims in <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> veins?
Yahahahaha! My strands will soak in the lifeblood of every last one of you!
Do you dare face the halo of my unleashed glory? Or turn your back and risk the sting of my rejection?
My pride is clipped... My strength is shorn... The Nullstone is yours...
Weevils and maggots! I shall spin another web! Yes! More threads to bind you!
See what you have done! My poor web is in tatters!
Why must you wriggle so! You've ruined another web!
Body of rock, from rough stone hewn... Chipped with chisel and marked by rune...
Mind of spells, engraved instruction... Given life to wreak destruction...
Core of arcane will ignited... Made to crush the uninvited...
Departing now, the maker's spark... A shattered face, stone eyes grown dark...

The Shadow Queen's aether
There it is up ahead─the island from the tome! Let's find somewhere to dock this behemoth!
These buildings were meant to house the refugees of Mhach. A promised land, forgotten by time...
...The voidsent have claimed this place, just as I suspected. It is become a nest of shadows and despair.
The Queen's Coffin, rent in twain! Scathach is already awoken, then...
By the twitching of my whiskers, there is fell magick ahead. Only the queen herself could radiate malice of this magnitude!
Insolent mortals... One does not come uninvited to the Shadow Queen's castle!
Forgive me, my queen... This wretched wraith has failed you...
Oh, how I love entertaining unexpected guests! And do I spy some familiar faces in the crowd!?
Alas, we come to the end of my show... There shall be...no encore...
Welcome, mortals, to my citadel of shadows. Have you come to deepen the gloom with an offering of souls?
Such pervasive light... It doth steal into the darkest corners, and chase away my shadows...
You expect the creature I was before, enfeebled by confinement? Hah! Face me now in the fullness of my power!
Shall I thrust open the gate to the void? The night hounds slaver at the scent of your fear...
Another rift... Another chance to test your might?
Not even in eternal sleep shall you be free from the terror of my weaving!
The energies of the nether will be mine! I will bathe in primordial darkness!
Bow before the shrieking majesty of the void!
What have you done!? You seek to wrest from me control of the portal?
So be it. A contest of strength, then! A contest you have no hope of winning.
Impossible! I am a lord of the void, you cannot─ Aaarrrggghhh!
<pant> <pant> Mine imprisonment...weakened me more than I imagined...
But you have not bested me yet! Witness now my true purpose for seeking the queen's rebirth!
Yes. The glory! An infinite well of shadow! You have breached Scathach's unholy vessel, and released her power unto me!
From the depths of shadow's well shall rise your ruination!
Must I entreat the very specter of death to be rid of you!? I care not! I will wager all for your destruction!
What more must I have...? How great the flood of darkness...to drown out your light...
Creeping shade and silhouette, gather unto me!
To me, my protégé! Smother these intruders with the arts that I have taught thee!
And still you refuse to dim and submit... Must I try a different tact?
Your fate was sealed the moment you set foot in my domain!
From a chrysalis of light shall I birth the deepest shadow...
Accept my touch, and bask in tenebrous brilliance!

A behemoth!? We're going to have to roll up our sleeves!
Never one for half measures...eh, Omega?
Haha, yes! My monitor's down!
Mine too! That should take care of the cubes!
Great work, you two! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Nero─just a little further!
Godsdammit... I messed up...
Gah... I was out of my depth...
Nooo... Still so much to do...
My luck's run out... You'll have to manage without my wit...
Not even mine avatar is safe... I take my leave of thee, mortal.
Grrraaarrrghhh! You no like ground? I make you fly!
There is no escape. You shall be a pawn in my games unto death.
There is no escape. You shall be a pawn in my grand games unto death.
Let the board be changed!
That concludes the first round. Let the board be changed!
You've done well to survive the second round. But how will you fare in the next?
Well, well, aren't you durable? But it's only a matter of time before you crumble.
Four rounds over yet you still stand!? You clearly want for a challenge, and I shall give it to you!
For a change of pace, let us play...an escape game!
While you partake of the game, I shall partake of afternoon tea.
A starry gift comes for you, but you'll not wish to be around to receive it.
Escape swiftly, and you may well earn a prize.
Well, well, returned before I could drain my cup. You deserve a prize.
Hmph, I have long drained my cup. Such insolence to keep a lady waiting.
Afternoon tea is over. Let us resume our fun-filled games.
Dance is art in motion, and no one dances more artfully than I!
My dance brings the board to life!
My dance holds all in its thrall!
Let us add a special touch to the board. Oh, there's naught to fear...as long as you obey the rules.
Yes, you need but abide by the symbols. A simple game, yes?
How can you not grasp such a simple game? Are you failing on purpose?
Mayhap that was too easy. But benevolent as I am, I shall grant you a prize nonetheless.
Now then, let us increase the challenge with a delightful picture game!
What's the matter? If you do not abide by the symbols, there <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> be a penalty.
Come now, it really isn't all that hard. Surely you can do better.
Well, aren't we a natural at this? This calls for a prize!
I grow weary of this game. Mayhap I'll spice things up with a pinch of desperation.
Look upon these symbols. You will find them familiar.
A shield to block, a sword to strike, a cross to heal. Choose wisely, or pay the price!
Good, you understand the rules. You're clever. I like clever people.
And how about this pattern? What is the right answer?
Those who choose poorly will be duly punished!
Ah, such a sweet chorus, a veritable treat for the ears! A prize is in order!
Now then, let us have a race. Run, run, as fast as you can!
Hahaha... You shall all be given to the void!
Fall!
My magic is steeped in the greatest of powers─the power of the void!
My true strength lies in the void, and in the void all is laid bare!
You will rue provoking me! I shall send you to your doom!
Void devour you!
Nothingness is my weapon, and nothingness alone can strike me down!
Hahaha... Anger and hatred cannot defeat me!
Hahaha... Mine is the ultimate magic!
Hahaha... I shall send you to your doom!
My true strength lies in the void, and in the void all is laid bare!
Th-This cannot be...
Nooo!
Why!?
The void was mine to command!
How could it─ Arrrgh!
I am Neo Exdeath.
All memories...dimensions...existence... All that is shall be returned to nothing.
Then I, too, can disappear...
Forever!
Watch out, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! He's shaking the very foundations of creation!

You do not fear me!? You will!
Fools! You have not...yet seen...the limit of my reach...
Without order, creation is doomed to descend into chaos. I bring that order. You <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> kneel.
Your order...is a lie...
Hark! What army marches on Rofocale's demesne?
Ah... To die a good death...
It is to be a fight, then? I am only too happy to oblige!
Fool is the dog who bares his teeth before his master!
Like sheep before the wolf!
You are but blood to stain the circle!
The gods have no eyes for chattel!
Kneel and repent!
The world has no place for such wretches. Your claim to life is forfeit!
I am the truth from which you run!
I am the lies upon which you sup!
I am Revelation!
You will be judged!
Does it grieve you to see the depths of your own weakness laid bare? Maggots...
You do not belong in <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> world. Step into Nothing!
Sound the battle horns! Soldiers, to me!
The heavens tremble in my wake!
The auracite! Gaze upon its undying brilliance and know true fear!
Hah hah hah hah! Even a hound knows when to turn tail! Would you have us think you less than chattel!?
Ill fortune befall all who dare gaze upon me!
An inescapable hell awaits you all!
Without light, there can be only darkness!
Born of darkness, born of night! Come forth, my children!
To maintain order, one must first have control.
The land seeks order. It will not suffer the chaos you peddle. Nor will I!
Why do you resist!?
Resistance will be met with retribution! The land shall bury your screams!
To defy order is to defy creation itself!
Tear them asunder!
Even the laws of life itself are mine to bend! Rise sand! Rise stone! Heed my bidding!
Come! The cleansing flame will seal all wounds!
Rise dark water, and grant me strength!
Goddess of ice, be my blade!
Goddess of ice, be my shield!
Living shield, protect me from evil!
Freeze, dark waters! Steel my body! Steel my resolve!
Let the ichor flow. Let it birth the mire that will drown mine enemies!
Petty creatures! And still you do not fall!
Enough of this! I shall end you now. All of you!
How is this possible? Nothing can withstand the cold! Nothing!
Now, the city shall sleep!
Before us lies the Royal City. My father is somewhere inside. I can feel it.
These are no ordinary birds!
Something foul prevents our crossing. Ware its numbing breath!
Cid was not mistaken in his assessment of your skill in battle. Still, I worry that something even more sinister awaits us ahead.
Seeq bandits! It appears the deplorable creatures are here to raid abandoned homes.
My father mentioned the Empire using their might to put down rebellions within the city, but this destruction is too widespread. What if that creature we fought earlier...
More bandits...despite all the creatures we've encountered? I know not whether they are brave or foolish.
Another of the twisted “others”! This is not the work of the Empire. Something is wrong here.
Again, you have proven your worth to this expedition. Let us see what lies beneath the city.

Welcome to the Garamsythe Waterway. These tunnels are said to have existed since before even the Kingdom of Dalmasca was born. As the city grows, channels are widened, and new outlets dug. I would venture that some of the pools are so deep, no one alive has ever seen their bottoms.
The creatures here are not mere beasts or voidsent. The secrets that lie beyond must be ones worth keeping.
Any doubts I had of your participation in this rescue I have no longer. I was wrong to place mistrust in Cid and my sister's judgment. Now let us continue on. I sense we are close to our goal.
These ruins... We are no longer in Rabanastre, my friends. This is Lesalia. The Lesalia of Ivalician legend!
The air here feels...wrong. Can't you sense it? Death awaits us in yon chamber.
The ice burns hotter than flame! You are branded for life!
Crawl forth from the shadows, my pet!
Pah! You have yet to witness the auracite's true might!
I walk the shadows. You will not see me until my lance has transfixed your very soul!
The tip of my lance is already at your necks. Submit, or die.
The light! It blinds!
Drown in my darkness!
Writhe in the land's embrace!
O Bahamut! We shall stand guard as you make ready your divine judgment!
Ugh... None shall defy Lord Bahamut's will! On your knees, vermin!

We must break through! Forget the primal and focus on the foe before you!
Why...? I offer you peace and ssserenity... Sssurrender yourselves to me...
And give up the freedom we've worked so hard to win? Not likely!
Do not your mortal bodies tire? Far better to dwell in dream.
We'll keep our eyes open, thanks very much!
I shall free you from your hate.
There are too many... We can't stop them all!
Why? Why do you deny my blessing!? You who defy me shall ressst in death!
They brought you into this world over a mistake I made... And I'll be damned if I let you taunt me with it!
I'll cut us a path. Stand ready!
You cannot flee my radiance. You will all be my dreamers.
We'll lock her down as best we can. The rest of you need to run!

All of you, to me!
Why are you two staying!? She still has more than enough strength to addle you both!
You need more than three to best a primal! And if we let you fall here, then who'll be left to stop her?
Pitiful, misssguided children. Lay down your weapons, lay down your heads...
Wha─ I can't move! She's going after Lyse and Raubahn!
Do not your sssouls weigh heavy?
She's building up to something big! Come close to me, all of you!
Nice work, Fordola! ...Are you all right, though?
<huff> This... <gasp> ...This is nothing!
Ugh, it's one thing after another... We have to fight as one!
Why do you cling to your misery?
She's starting to weaken! Don't give up!
Behold...my divine brilliance!
What in the─? Her power's out of control! I'll shield us, but you'll have to finish her off!
...Quickly! I can't hold her off forever!
...Kill her! <gasp> You need to kill her now!
<gasp> I can't... <groan> I'm spent...
My thanks, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I'll make sure my steel is worth the effort!
Again and again you refuse my gift...
Quickly now, while the primal is─ ...Lyse!?
Godsdammit! We've failed...
Hold on, Fordola... We end this now! For Ala Mhigo!

Welcome to the Valentione's Ceremony, kupo.
Here, the pair of you will undertake two trials. By your performance, we will know your affinity for one another.
First up, “Till Mog Do Us Part.” The rule is simple: get through the maze, kupo.
Just take care not to stray too far from one another, or your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Affinity<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> will weaken!
Next up, “Cards Beat as One.” Work together to find matching pairs of cards, kupo.
Be warned: picking the wrong cards results in a penalty.
You may begin, kupo!
You may begin, kupo!
You made it, kupo!
That does it for the second trial, kupo! We've seen all that we need to see!
And now, the moment you've been waiting for...
How well did your bond hold up amid the trials? All shall be revealed, kupo!
Your affinity can be likened to a rotten kupo nut. I wouldn't wish it on my worst enemy, kupo.
Your affinity can be likened to an ordinary kupo nut. It could be better, but I'd still eat it, kupo.
Your affinity can be likened to a plump kupo nut. It makes you the envy of moogles for malms around!
B-By the heavens, this is nothing short of a miracle! Were your affinity a kupo nut, it would be the golden kupo nut of myth!
Off you go, kupo! The first trial awaits!
Er, right... Well, you got through the first trial, kupo. That has to count for something.
Well done getting through the first trial, kupo. That wasn't a bad effort, but there's room for improvement.
Well done getting through the first trial, kupo! I must say, that was some impressive teamwork!
Now then, since I'm such a kind moogle, here's a bit of help to get you started.
Onward, kupo! The second trial awaits!
I'm going to give you a little flash. Don't tell anyone, alright, kupo?
Have yourself a good eyeful before I put them away.
Nice one, kupo! Keep up the good guesswork!
Wow, you didn't make a single mistake! That's incredible, kupo!
Too bad, kupo. You have to focus and work together.
That's all the cards matched. Well done, kupo!
That concludes the Valentione's Ceremony. We look forward to hosting you again, kupo!

Spirits, lost and wandering... Feed upon the souls of these heretical fools!
Your struggles are in vain. Accept your fate, and fall into death's embrace!

Quick, now! Make your peace with death! Because I'm making your death with all these pieces!

Did you think you'd won? Oh no no no, we've just begun!

Gahahaha! UNLEASH IT ALL!

Tremble before the might of the earth!
Sons of man! Murderers of my children!
For thee my hatred is unending, unyielding!
Hie, my children, into the dark! <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> will not be denied...
All my fury I shall bring to bear against thy kind!
Your tale ends here, Warrior of Light!
You but delay the inevitable.

My wounds...give me strength!
We will discover Ba'Gamnan here within the lighthouse. I am certain of it.
Did Ba'Gamnan─the Duma─give life to that creature!?
The seal on the gate is lifted. We can now venture further up the lighthouse.
This pattern... It is unmistakably─ No, it cannot be...
The city remains functional...after all these centuries. Let us access the transportation nodes.
The city's defenses also seem operational. Destroy them, if you must.
The heat...is almost unbearable. Could this be the heart of the lighthouse's beacon?
I've discovered another device.
The architecture here is similar to that of the lighthouse...yet something feels off. The air...is so thin...
I believe you've succeeded in clearing another path.
Those golems... I believe I now know where we are!
The area's final line of defense is upon us. We must proceed with the utmost caution!
There is no mistaking it. We are in the legendary Clockwork City of Goug!
Oh...it's going to be a long night.
Let's share the torment, shall we...?
Enough of that. I wouldn't want the pain to grow familiar.
Struggle all you wish─I encourage it! Your death will be all the sweeter...
Why does it fade away...?
Worthless excuse for a daughter. You're nothing but trouble.
A font of misery, that's what you are!
Fight like your life depends on it, dear sister. You wouldn't want to disappoint me...
If it isn't the cold-blooded little worm. Always crawling through my rotten heart.

Stay behind me, Tsuyu!
Why...? You have no place here...

All is bitterness and ashes...
In darkness blooms the spider lily...
From mortal husk I rise anew!
Suffused with night, I shall prevail!
In moonlight's chill, shine petals pale...
In sunless gloom, black tendrils trail...
Rising moon! A light without warmth, stark and uncaring!
Reaping crescent! A sweeping doom, striking from darkness!
No. No... Not yet. Not. Yet.
Yes, my dearest parents. I was the bane of your existence unto the very end!
The waning moon commands the night. Its light...and its darkness!
This is far from over! My bloodied hands have much left to accomplish!
A nightbloom shall flower here upon the site of my demise...
A nightbloom shall flower here upon the graves of my enemies!
You have come to deliver judgment for my failure? Cut me down, then. Surely it is a simple task!
The stalks are cast, and the fates have spoken. There will be no dawn for Doma─only night unending.
You must survive, Tsuyu! The kami spared us, and we cannot repay that boon in death!
A tiresome contest. Begone from my sight!
Am I sunk to my lowest, then...?
...Ah. I understand. It feeds on my spite. On my suffering...
Come forth, shades of the dead! Curse my name! Strike my body! Fill my soul with blackest malice!

Hearken to my melody...

My soul demands more, khagan! Give me more!

But so long as my lifeblood flows...I will fight on!

Ugh, this bodes ill... Y'shtola─some healing would be welcome!
So you still stand. But soon you will kneel.
Know the folly of opposing the will of Azim!
These axes will not break! You have nowhere to hide!

I shall take care of this!

Divide and conquer, Gilgamesh style!
I have learned much and more in the Far East, my friends! Behold!
Double your pleasure! Double your fun!

How our hearts sing in the chaos!

The aether grows thick. She whom we seek must lie beyond this threshold.
My name is Mustadio Bunansa...and all paths lead through me.
Nothing I cannot fix!
And where might you be off to?
You have proven yourself deserving of the title, Zodiac Brave. With this my journey can, at long last, come to an end.
The Beoulve youth guides your fate, but have you the faith to fulfill his legacy?
Well fought, champion. I leave you now to your quest. My Ovelia awaits...
Witness as the light returns!
Spirits of heroes fallen, rise! Pass thy judgment on those who would gaze unto the beyond!
Bend to my will! An inescapable prison awaits!
Graaaaaah!
To the current of life we succumb, its judgment swift and final. Its bite as cold as steel.
The hearts of men are black with corruption and must needs be cleansed!
Seven shadows cast, seven fates foretold. Yet at the end of the broken path lies death, and death alone.
I call out to the skies and tremble as the brilliance of a thousand bolts blinds mine enemies and tears their flesh asunder.
They who dwell aloft have spoken. Let their words echo in your empty soul. Ruination is come!
The dreams of men are fleeting, yet they must be embraced if they are to flourish. Have you the faith to do as much?
Gaze deep into the light!
O, divine light! Send us from our sins!
Raise your shields against the falling light!
Raise your swords against the coming night!
You shall rue the day you raised your eyes to the heavens.
Denizens of the abyss! From ink of blackest night, I summon you!
I see it now. In you...his blood, my vanquisher in times...long past. But not so soon...shall I accept defeat...
O darkest of vessels! You are my sword! You are my rain!
Time waits for no one!
To maintain order, one must first have control.
Honed is the blade that severs the villain's head. Endless is the path that leads him from hell.
It is time to end this!
Bare your steel!
Simmer does the light of life before rising to the heavens in a cleansing conflagration of divine benevolence.
She weaves her foul magicks!
Only we can shield you from doom! To me, heroes! To me!
You will not intervene!
What is she doing!?
The barrier will not last! We must stop her!
Is it over?
I am the only god!
Such fury!
Now is not the time to stay our blades!
Children of Hydaelyn! Make it swift! You are Her only hope!
Few can claim to have endured the might of my will.
Your coming was foretold, servant of Ivalice. Or perhaps you serve another.
I am Count Cidolfus Orlandeau. Your journey ends here.
The clouds have parted and the skies cleared. It is time I bade you farewell.
To the current of life we succumb, its judgment swift and final. Its bite as cold as steel.
The hearts of men are black with corruption and must needs be cleansed!
Seven shadows cast, seven fates foretold. Yet at the end of the broken path lies death, and death alone.
They who dwell aloft have spoken. Let their words echo in your empty soul. Ruination is come!
I call out to the skies and tremble as the brilliance of a thousand bolts blinds mine enemies and tears their flesh asunder.
Open your eyes to the darkness, and drown in its loveless embrace. The gods will not be watching.
To live by the sword is to die by the sword. There is time enough for regret in the flames of hell.
Even the strongest of shields cannot defend the weakest of wills. A moment's hesitation beckons a lifetime of pain!
Misfortune hangs heavy on a head once held high. Such is poor cover for when the heavens fall.
Honed is the blade that severs the villain's head. Endless is the path that leads him from hell.
Hark! The screams of ruin rise above the storm's discord. Shudder not in her endless cold.
You will need to withstand far more than this if you are to stand against the likes of <var 1A 02 /var>her<var 1A 01 /var>!
I have been called the god of thunder. You will now know why! Upon my holy blade the very world lies in balance.
And now the scales will tip!
That was merely the beginning, Warrior of Light! Merely the beginning!
Death awaits defiance!
Watch this!
You show promise. But promise won't save you from what comes next!
Let this be your final testament!
I rarely miss.
“逃がすものかッ！”
I see you!
Tell me... What is your darkest fear?
The path ends here, but for that arcane circle. Do you believe it some sort of gate?
The ruins of the monastery lie ahead, but do not think the path will be easy.
Harpies? My sisters would not allow this... Unless...
Impressive. Perhaps you are deserving of your accolades. But do you have an answer for this...this Mist? Or is it aether?
Only the name of these ruins lives on with my people. We have no knowledge of their past, nor do we wish it. Trespass into the monastery is avoided except when necessary.
Ahead! I see someone... No... Some<var 1A 02 /var>thing<var 1A 01 /var>.
The last time I was here, the only thing holding watch over these stones was a deafening silence. Could it be that guardian rose from its slumber upon sensing your master's auracite?
When the Empire marched upon Rabanastre, many who lived in the desert fled east to the sanctuary of the jungle. Some who were not turned away by my sisters are said to have taken refuge here.
There! Another...Lucavi? It appears to be a knight, but how─
She was a knight most noble, and her sacrifice will not be forgotten. My sisters will want to know much of her tale, I believe.
Something here feels different than the monastery above... Otherworldly...
Can you not feel it? An evil lurks here...one far beyond our ken.
Once, when I was very young, I heard the elders speak of a dark city where the horrors that haunt our nightmares dwell. The Necrohol, they called it─the Necrohol of Mullonde.
This...guardian─he is not like the first two. We must tread with care, lest our journey meet a premature end.
The Mist I sensed before─the aether─its flow is much stronger now. It is almost as if the guardians we defeated were somehow preventing its escape...
If I must forsake myself to keep mine oath, then so be it!
Not since Tenzen have I...I...
You brought this upon yourself!
Beg not for mercy!
How it burns!
You've nowhere to run!
Impudent mortals!
Tremble before true power!
None can match my might!
More! I must have more! O aramitama!
Grant me the strength to smite mine enemies!
Bah! Stubborn fools! This is far from over!
Divided we shall triumph!
Flesh of my flesh, show them their folly!
No, I will not lose! I cannot!
RISE WE, THE LAND, THE LAND!
FALL YOU, CRUSH YOU, OUR DUTY!
SWALLOW YOU, CONSUME YOU, OUR DUTY!
THE LAND, THE LAND, THE LAND...
RISE AGAIN, THE LAND, THE LAND!
ENDURE YOU, DEFY YOU, HOW DARE!
THE LAND, THE LAND, THE LAND...
Alright, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, it's time to put your new power to use.
You'll get the hang of it in no time. We'll warp circles around Garuda!
Get ready, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! We warp in to strike together!
Yeah, that's what I call teamwork! Keep it up!
No good─we gotta strike at the same time. Follow my lead!
Something big's comin'! Quick, get clear!
Running's too slow! Warp to the pillar!
Son of a─! Hang on, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
I'll take it from here!
Heh, I even amaze myself sometimes.

Now!
Of all the places...
Hold your ground until the Warrior of Light arrives
Defeat Zenos yae Galvus
Still you choose to struggle against the inevitable...
Let's put an end to this here and now!
Behold─a taste of my true power!
Look upon Ame-no-Habakiri and know the depths of your folly!
Do you truly believe that possible? Then let us test the limits of this Garlean vessel.
Soon I shall give the lie to man's <var 1A 02 /var>indomitable<var 1A 01 /var> spirit.
Fight and struggle if that is your wont, but you will not escape your fate.
So, there are still those willing to stand against the crown prince. Interesting...
Our fate is not for you to decide!
<var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> comes, does <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var>? Then I need not waste my time on you.
A formidable foe... But we have come too far to fail now.
Grrr... Ngh... What is this sorcery!?
Enough! You <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> learn your place.
Impossible... How is it you have grown so powerful in the gift!?
You are strong, Bringer of Light, but Her blessing will avail you not.
To redress the balance─to ensure the salvation of this star─you must fall!
No matter... You may have bested Lahabrea, but I will not be cast aside so easily!
We will suffer your interference no longer.
You think you know of the dark, but I will show you the true nature of our power!
The potential of this vessel is transcendent─without limit!
Lyse, no... What have you done!?
I cannot fail... Not again...
ユウギリよ、リセを助けるぞ！
いや、よくやったユウギリよ！ 残るは、わしが叩き斬ってくれようぞ！
No! I can still fight, I can still...still...
クッ……ひとつ仕損じたか……！
If he would bring all to bear then so must we!
Oh no you don't!
No... Not like this...
し、しまった……！？
Well done dispelling his phantoms. Now hurry, we must protect Lyse!
If we can at least hold out until <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> arrives, I'm sure we can turn this around.

Strength, my friends! It would not do to have <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> arrive to find us battered and broken!
We may be on the back foot, but it's not over yet!

Water is love, water is life! Drink up, ye parched souls!
There'll be no wilted flowers on my watch!
Onward, my friends! Onward to your prize!
Oh dear, I seem to have dropped a wasp nest! How very clumsy of me!
My apologies, but accidents do happen!
Come and play in my beautiful garden!
Awww, it's a fake! You'll just have to keep going!
Welcome! Welcome to our humble palace!
Bravo, bravo! Very impressive!
Do keep up that fine form the rest of the way!
Ah, our guests have arrived!
It's the Fuath way to give guests a smashing welcome!
Oh yes, we'll smash you! To bits and pieces!
Time for a musical interlude!
O sweet melody, take phantasmic form!
You mastered the melody! Bravo!
For you, I will play a song...of terror!

Nooo! M-My performance!

Welcome to the final days of Amaurot...
The fabric of our star began to fray...
...and the unchecked energies of creation begat malformed beasts.
Just as prayer gives rise to primals, our dread made manifest our deepest fears.
The land buckled; the cities burned; the waters ran red with blood...
Yet this was far from the worst of it. Come, and I will show you...
Just a little further...
...and you will see the end of a world.
The star was fading. We saw we had to weave its laws anew...
But between us and our goal loomed a final misbegotten fiend...
The beast bellows, and gives birth to terror. A terror which, in turn, gives birth to new beasts...
Its gaze turns skyward, and fiery rain falls from the heavens...
Once the fear has taken root, it cannot be expunged...
As if feeding upon the horror, the beast bloats...then shivers...then ruptures...
Defeat <var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2201201 /var>
The first beast was striking in its unsightliness...
As if to scour away all life, it called down a cataclysmic deluge.
Yet even its defeat did not halt the march of oblivion...
From the depths of despair, the last harbinger arose...
Its voice was fulgent destruction, and none could stand in its path.
And as it edged inexorably closer, we knew...
Without decisive sacrifice, our star would surely perish.

Relive Branden and Ardbert's battle against Tadric!
Come, my children! Render up your lives for your master!
For all your crimes and more, you will pay!
The direct approach isn't working...
Your feeble tricks are no match for my magicks!
He's drawing upon the aether of his thralls. Kill them!
Poor bastards. That's what you get for trusting a court mage...
Branden! Bring them all in close!
Such an incredible display of strength! The stuff of legends!
There's no escape, Tadric! Surrender!
While I still have so many lives at my disposal? I think not.
Come, children! In death shall your meaningless lives gain glorious purpose!
I'll defend Lamitt! Branden, go to Nyelbert!
Now... Burn bright for me, and die, die, die!
How many more must die for your vanity!?
No sacrifice is too great to claim what is by rights mine!
Rise, my children! Rise and defend me!
TAAADRIIIC!!!
Branden─don't let him cast that spell! Do whatever it takes!
Hahaha! What is life but a medium for my magicks!?
How much longer can you hold the line, I wonder?
The bastard's keen to drag this out...
Everyone! Now's our chance to turn the tide!
I've still got a few arrows in my quiver!
Branden, bring them all into the center like before!
See that, Tadric!? You're next!
Time to thin the herd...starting with that dwarf perhaps?
Don't you touch her, you bastard!
Branden─we have to defend Lamitt at all costs!
Whew, thank you both!
I tire of these theatrics. Let us end this farce here and now!
This castle will be your tomb!
He's channeling a vast quantity of aether! Whatever he's preparing, we cannot let him finish!
You heard Lamitt! We have to stop him!
Don't ask for mercy, Tadric. You won't get it!
Mwahaha! You are beaten, Branden! Voeburt and your precious princess are mine for the taking!
We can't keep this up forever!
You are most tenacious, but everyone has their limits...
That attack's too much for any one person to take! We have to stand together! Understood!?
Understood!
Your end is nigh!
Surely no one can harness such a massive torrent of aether...
Such obedient children, to offer up their lives in sacrifice!
Unrepentant to the last... This madness dies with you.
Come and play! For the night is bright, and you can sleep when you're dead!
Squish, squash! A crimson flower!
This may tingle a bit!
This is the rhythm of the light!
Twist and sprout!
We're sick of this cramped old castle! Let's play in the forest!
Dance like the leaves on the boughs!
This is so much fun! Let's play some more!
Wet, wet, wet!
When you play with fire...
Can you guess which one?
Grow, my lovelies! Grow!
Bigger is better!
Owww, that hurts! You play rough!
I grow weary of this waking dream. 'Tis time to sleep for good.
Where did everyone go? Why did they all leave me?
The more the merrier! Join us, my children!

Let's begin the G-Warrior training simulation. I've prepared three trials to teach you the basics.
First, I want you to try attacking the guidance system. Don't worry, it won't fight back!
The G-Warrior is armed with a range of weaponry. Now's your chance to learn what it's capable of.
So far, so good. Let's move on to something a bit more advanced, shall we?
If you feel you've already learned enough, you can end the simulation by accessing the training node.
But once you begin combat, you won't be able to leave the simulation until it's over.
All right, let's continue.
The G-Warrior also comes equipped with the Pyretic Booster, which diverts even more power to its weapons and increases its speed and maneuverability.
This, however, comes at a price. Activating it places a huge strain on the G-Warrior, so it must only be used in short bursts.
That's why it's best to practice here before heading into battle. Now, try activating the Pyretic Booster!
You'll notice that your movement speed is much improved. But as shown on your monitor, the G-Warrior becomes more and more structurally unstable as time passes.
To deactivate the Pyretic Booster, press the same button again.
Now to try using the Pyretic Booster to destroy the target.
This time, the node will launch wide reaching attacks in quick succession. But with your increased movement speed, you should have no trouble evading them.
Excellent work, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! You'd best deactivate the Pyretic Booster while I explain the final trial.
Are you listening? Quickly, deactivate the Pyretic Booster! Even though it's only a simulation, it'll terminate prematurely if you're not careful.
We've covered offense, now to look at defense. This is where the Aetherial Aegis should come in handy.
Unfortunately, you can't keep the barrier up indefinitely as it will drain the G-Warrior's power reserves. You might even run out of energy for the weapons, so watch out.
First, let's try deploying the Aetherial Aegis.
The monitor shows how much power is being drained. Don't let it get too low!
That's enough for now. Turn off the barrier using the same button used to deploy it.
For the last trial, we'll use the Aetherial Aegis while attempting to destroy the target.
Unlike before, there is no way to escape its attacks, so you'll need to weather them using the barrier.
You're a natural! All right, that's everything. Time to end the simulation.
You'll need to deactivate the Aetherial Aegis before you run out of power!
That's as much damage as the G-Warrior can take. If this was a real combat situation, you'd be...well, let's not dwell on that.
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? We can't test the Pyretic Booster if you don't activate it.

Forward, hero. We shall see how strong you have become.
Rest assured there are no tricks. You need but defeat the enemies before you.
First, something easy. Those whom a budding hero might encounter at the beginning of <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> tale.
And I believe I have the perfect subjects.
Let not their appearance stay your hand. Beneath the facade, they are merely monsters.
But come, we shouldn't dwell on the beginning when so much of your story awaits.
Every tale requires villains. Defeat them, and claim your place as a hero.
Well done, champion of Eorzea. Well done. Onward, then, over the bloodied bodies of the fallen.
You tasted many sweet triumphs, yes. But so too did you taste bitter tragedy.
Who could forget the Crystal Braves? That idealistic, pathetic dream born from a malformed creature.
Faces you know and loathe, all. Let your hatred burn, and strike them down with all your might.
With such ease yet again. You did always grow stronger with every battle.
But enough talk. It is not your assertions that I wish to know, but your strength.
Falsely accused of regicide, you fled for the snow-swept fields of Coerthas.
Had you and the Scions met your demise that day in the sultanate, Lahabrea might have been spared his.
But not only did you stubbornly live; you hurled yourself into the thick of the Dragonsong War.
Swept along by the tide of events, you pursued and slew those who sought to stop the unending conflict. Just as you were bid.
...Or was it a thirst for vengeance that drove you?
I trust you are beginning to limber up. Do keep up the fine form.
Around heroes, people are wont to flock. People who harbor all manner of motives, each baser than the last.
Come, let the curtains rise on the grand melee.
No more than they deserve. In the end, their hand of friendship was tainted with personal desire.
You know what comes next: you put an end to the Dragonsong War.
There is no saving your comrade this time. All you can do is cut off the serpent's head.
And as simple as that, a thousand-year war is brought to its conclusion.
But every end marks a new beginning. And for heroes such as you, there is only ever conflict.
Emperor Solus had kindled an insatiable flame. Garlemald was its name, and it raged across the land, consuming all in its path.
Following the trail of ash, you set forth for Ala Mhigo and Doma, into a storm of blood.
Again you fought, and again you grew stronger. So strong that we could no longer control you.
Yours is an unnatural, beastly strength. And we shall lay it bare.
In order to gain a foothold in the liberation effort, you journeyed to Far Eastern plains.
There you encountered the land's greatest warriors, and sought to win them over to your cause.
The strong are drawn to the strong. Thus did you gather new allies to your banner.
Yet where ardent souls gather, so too do fires burn. In this way did you consign those around you to the flames.
Burn them all, hero. Reduce them to nothingness, like the ephemeral morning dew they are.
You did not hesitate...or perhaps could not? No matter. Let us turn our attention to the finale.
Here we shall have a test between fellow beasts. It is only fitting, would you not agree?
When I fought you in this flesh, 'twas I who triumphed. Will you turn the tables this time?
Come. We continue this within.

All that made him the warrior he was─every battle waged, every blow swung─is part of my very being.
So come! Fight me like you mean to take my head!
Good, good... I sense your murderous intent.
Aye, you'd kill me given the chance. Mayhap you think to recover this body?
If so, prove that it's no use to me! Prove that I can't best you with it!
Come! Come at me with everything you've got!

Very well, I will transcend my very limits. And we'll see what you're truly capable of!

Intruder detected. Analyzing potential for knowledge acquisition... Affirmative.
Additional data desired. Transferring Omega unit to present coordinates.
Recalibrating threat levels... Deploying draconic specimen.
Analyzing combat data... Fascinating. Deploying new rocket-propelled armaments.
Capabilities exceed expected values. Initializing transformation sequence.
Neural structure of hostile life-forms analyzed. Stand by for interruption to combat functions.
まさか……敗北…… 敗北したと……戦略に致命的な誤りがあったと……！？
Projection into simulated memory confirmed. You now witness the final war between our kind.
With the Alphatron Star's resources depleted beyond hope of sustainability, we were on the brink of destruction.
As part of the faction favoring subjugation of other stars, it created units for the upcoming invasion.
<whirr> Stigma-4 detected! Eliminate the unit guarding it and destroy its core!
Stigma-4 has initiated evasive action. Establishing connection with next memory region...
This memory region reflects our people's first encounter with another star─the subjugation of Gordhona.
Configuring data stream... Neural pathway connected.
The Lambda unit before you was produced in Gordhona with local materials, as became our standard operating protocol.
Stigma-4 has retreated into the next memory region. This unit requests you pursue with all haste.
As this unit projected, this memory is of our conflict on the Dragonstar.
<whirr> The dragons' assault has created a breach in the barrier. Infiltrate the facility!
<whirr> Access to Stigma-4's perceived “self” confirmed! Destroy this core to overwrite its expectation of victory.
Alert: Your presence has been detected. Sentinel units approaching current coordinates!
Those who would claim the resources of other stars clashed with those who believed that Alphatron might yet be saved.
At this time, Stigma-4─then known as “Alpha-4”─was positioned in the weapons manufacturing facility ahead.
Now approaching command sector. Accessing administrative memory to disable security system...
Our objective was to obtain the rich mineral resources of the Gordhonite asteroid belt─by any means necessary.
The Gordhonites boasted considerably advanced technology, but their machines proved inferior to the invading force.
The dragons were our strongest enemy, and it was through their capture and study that Stigma-4 learned the principles of adaptive evolution.
These principles were used to design the systems of the Omega model─first deployed in an unfinished state.

Defeat the Magus Sisters
A foul place, this. Let us proceed with caution.
They seek to bar our path. The only way is through!
Oh gods, poor Nidhana! We'll free you from this place, I promise!
I sense a great surge of aether, as if... A summoning hath begun!
Look! Those beastly masks! It's the Manusya, come to life!
We will focus on sustaining the Arkasodara!
The rest of you must keep going! Onwards and upwards!
Begone from our tower...
Begone...or become prey for the Magus!
Behold our ingenious magicks!
Dance! Dance until death claims you!
So, you have chosen defiance...
The tower must be protected...
We will not let it fall!
You will not steal away our prosperity!
We hear it! We heed it! The call to defend the tower!
If I alone cannot expel you...
You persist in your desecration?
Then face the full wrath of the Magus!
Join with me, Sisters!
Insatiable flame, consume our foe!
Glacial ice, entomb our foe!
Thunderous tempest, smite our foe!
While my blessings endure, then so shall we...
The end has come...and it will be beautiful!
Soon, my hold over Zodiark shall be complete...
Mine...all mine!
Ahahahahahaha!
The instrument of salvation...
...tolling the death knell of all creation!
Still...still you refuse to yield!?
The natural order overturned...
...all in existence bent to my will!
Malice... Become flesh!
The great cataclysm...faithfully recreated.
From broken skies fall tears of flame...
All shall burn!
The marvels of Syrcus were but playthings...
I have no need for restraint!
This cannot be... I am a god... A god!
Now comes the end for you and all you hold dear.
Darkness rises!
Will you live to see the end?
How I've waited for this day!
My life's work...my masterpiece!
At last, I am become Zodiark!
Have you the strength of will to alter man's fate?
Crystals of Light, to me!
Hear...
The song of creation's end...
Feel...
The sorrow at hope's demise...
Think...
And find your way in the Darkness.
Follow your Light...
Or fly, my children, and never look back!
Then you are resolved...
...but this test is far from over!
The Light doth obey my command!
Succumb not to fear!
Flee. You have been found wanting.
A change of arms... May the test continue!
A change of arms... Mark well my movements!
By Crystal's Light...
And now this!
Our hunt ends this day. There is nowhere you can flee that we cannot follow.
Even stars must die.
We have seen the end.
The same end, again and again.
All of us have known despair.
A sorrow so deep only emptiness remains.
This is a kindness.
'Tis so lonely between the stars.
Battered by the husks of the dead and dying.
If there is no happiness in life...
There is only one place it may be found.
Oblivion!
Dynamis?
No matter. You only delay the inevitable.
This is fate!
Your time has come. It always does...
Light the way!
What is this defiance?
No! The hatred, the pain, the loss...
We cannot suffer it again...
What we saw... What I saw...
This can only end in misery and desolation!
No life, no star, nor the universe itself...
None should hope for better!
Embrace the quiet!
Utterly futile.
Your suffering is at an end.
We will stand against fate.
No matter the cost!
We've been here before...
Many a time.
Thus do we know...
To never give up.
For hope will shine again!
10 seconds until oblivion is sealed...
5 seconds until oblivion is sealed...
4 seconds until oblivion is sealed...
3 seconds...
2 seconds...
1 second...

Those who lived and festered, those who died and decayed...
Its people sought ever greater freedoms no matter the cost...
So they created the kindest, most gentle of beasts.
Its steps were light, and its gift was as painless as it was beautiful.
Bathed in its golden glow, they all slept happily ever after...
For altruism and selfishness both were its carriers.
Once upon a time, there was a beautiful blue star...
...that fell to pestilence, and rotted inside and out.
The more its people clung to life, the more they suffered.
Until they cursed not the illness, but their fellow corrupted.
And the very last of them wished they had never been born at all.
In a faraway place, a brilliant star eradicated disease...
...before destroying the selfsame lives it had saved.
They tried to buy peace with fire and steel...
And when one asked, “What is the point?” there were none left to answer.
Farther still existed a star without strife...
...where none remembered life's trials─or its joys.
What its people had gained from ease, they lost to apathy.
